methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Marks the post as read

methods.name: markAsUnread
methods.description: Marks the post as unread

methods.name: flag
methods.description: Assigns a flag of the specified color to the post. Valid colors are "blue", "green", "yellow", "orange", "red", "purple"

methods.name: unflag
methods.description: Unassigns a flag of a specified color from the post. Valid colors are "blue", "green", "yellow", "orange", "red", "purple"

methods.name: assignToScriptFolder
methods.description: Assigns the post to the specified script folder

methods.name: unassignFromScriptFolder
methods.description: Unassigns the post from the specified script folder

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Gets the title of the post

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the post

methods.name: setLink
methods.description: Sets the link of the post

methods.name: getLink
methods.description: Gets the link of the post

methods.name: getLink
methods.description: Gets the link of the post

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Gets the content of the post

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the post

methods.name: setAuthor
methods.description: Sets the author of the post

methods.name: getAuthor
methods.description: Gets the author of the post

methods.name: getCommentsURL
methods.description: Gets the comment URL of the post

methods.name: setCommentsURL
methods.description: Sets the comment URL of the post

methods.name: getEnclosures
methods.description: Gets the enclosures of a post

methods.name: addEnclosure
methods.description: Adds a new enclosure

methods.name: setURL
methods.description: Sets the URL of the post enclosure

methods.name: getURL
methods.description: Gets the URL of the post enclosure

methods.name: setMimeType
methods.description: Sets the mimetype of the post enclosure

methods.name: getMimeType
methods.description: Gets the mimetype of the post enclosure

methods.name: setSize
methods.description: Sets the size (in bytes) of the post enclosure

methods.name: getSize
methods.description: Gets the size (in bytes) of the post enclosure

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the post enclosure
